translation.en: [on voicemail] Hi. This is Amahle. Leave a message, and I'll get you back.

translation.en: -[line beeps] -[woman] Good afternoon, Ms. Edwards.

translation.en: This is Principal Denkins at North Detroit High School.

translation.en: [takes a deep breath] Unfortunately, Cole was involved in another fight today

translation.en: Ms. Edwards, I'm not sure that we have the resources here to help your son.

translation.en: At this point, we are recommending him for expulsion.

translation.en: I am so sorry about the incident today. I'm very, very sorry--

translation.en: I ain't do nothin', aight?

translation.en: [scoffs] It ain't my fault.
Why you got my clothes in bags?

translation.en: -[Amahle takes a deep breath] -Where you taking me?
You're gonna stay with your father for the summer.

translation.en: What?
With my father?
Nah, fuck that! I ain't spendin' nothin' with that nigga.

translation.en: Stop! Stop actin' like you know!
This life… isn't working, Cole.

translation.en: You are drowning out here. You are going to drown!

translation.en: I've literally done everything I could think of for you.
And still, here I am again, leaving work,

translation.en: trying to convince another principal and another police officer

translation.en: that my son knows better.
And you don't.
-[gear selector clicks] -And neither do I anymore.
-[Cole groans, exhales] -Hey, where you at? We're here.

-[door closes] -I ain't stayin' here.
-[door handle rattles] -Ma, open the door.
[Cole] Mama, open the door.
-Mama, I'm not playing. Open the door. -[Amahle sobbing] Cole.

I'm talkin' to you. Come over here.
You all grown up.
Do I know you?
I know you.
You Harp's boy.
-Where he at? -[woman] Stables.
The what?
Oh, come on, now.
Stables.
[Cole] I don't know no stables.
I don't know you.
[woman] Fletcher Street Stables.
Around the corner. You'll smell it when you get close.

translation.en: [woman] And, Cole…
I'm Nessie.
Welcome back.
-[man 1] Yeah, that what I'm saying. -[man 2] Wait. Where you ever seen one?

translation.en: -[man 1] Saw one yesterday. -[man 2] Where?
-[man 1] The step. -[man 2] Praying mantis?
[woman] You shouldn't kill anything with the word "praying" in its name. Like…

translation.en: [man 2] This is gonna be a dry summer.
[man 3] "I just saw that you might've been asleep." I said, "Nah, you…"

translation.en: "You was watchin' me sleep. How you gon--"

translation.en: -Where'd he come from? -[man 4] Who that?
Hold up. Hold on.
Let me get your bag. Let's go.

translation.en: No, I'm good.
[exhales] I'll see y'all later.
-Come on. -[group] All right.
-[man 1] Hmm. -[Harp] Hit the door.
-[horse whinnies] -Yo! Shit.
-This Chuck. -[Chuck nickering]
He ain't makin' no friends, so watch your hands.

translation.en: [takes a deep breath] Well, this you, right here.
I ain't stayin' here.
Aight.
-I'mma hit it, though. -[keys jangle]
Once you step out, that door stays locked till morning.

translation.en: I'll leave in the morning.
-Shit. -[fridge door rattles]
[man 3] That's it.
Aight, come on.
Come on, Esha. Listen… come on. Bring him over here.

translation.en: -[woman 1] I don't have a phone. -I'm just trying-- You don't have a phone?

translation.en: -Hey, excuse me. Can I-- -[woman 2] I got a kid. Nah.

-Cole! -[engine turns off]
What's good with you, young boul?
I heard you was back.
Smush?
Yeah, Smush. [chuckles] It's me, man.

The fuck you doing on the curb for?
-Yo. -[Smush] Fucking get up, man.
Hey. Shit.
-What's up, man? -Damn. I'm chillin', man.
Man, let's get you outta here, man.
[Cole] You don't even know how good it is to see you right now.

I used to be like, "Cole, let's go play with the water guns." You'd be like, "Aight."

translation.en: and spray your ass.
-That's nasty. -[Smush] You ain't even know it was piss.
You was like, "Ma! Ma, Smush pissed on me!" [laughs]

translation.en: Yo, that's fucked up, man. For real.

translation.en: -Yeah, you kinda still smell like piss. -No. Shut the fuck up.

translation.en: -[sighs] Damn. It's been a minute, man. -[Cole sighs]
Missed your ass.
Can't believe your moms dragged you down from Detroit like that.

translation.en: -[grunts] That shit crazy. -Shit.
Yeah, I know, man. Tryna get home now.

Easy. Simple.

Oh, I know what it is.
[chuckles] Yeah. You got a girl back home.

translation.en: -Nah? -[inhales sharply] Nah.
Oh, hold on, hold on, hold on.
Aight, yo. Wait here, aight?

aight.

[sighs] Harp said I'm not allowed to ride with you no more or… or he'll kick me out.

Shit. [man 3] Oh, he done dropped shit on his shoes.
[sighs] Yo, Esha, right?

As long as it takes.

Cole.
I know who you is.

Get this pitchfork.

translation.zh: 今天我要端正一下你的态度

translation.en: You got more stalls to do. You better get this shit done. Come on.
translation.zh: 还有很多栏位要清理 赶紧干完活 快点

translation.en: [Paris] That's… That's white and tan. That's good. Get the brown and green shit.
translation.zh: 对了 就是白色和棕色的 铲棕色和绿色的粪

translation.en: Go ahead. Keep on pickin'.
And all that wet shit. Get that shit outta there.
translation.zh: 还有那些湿的东西 也要弄出去

translation.en: [Paris] Just take it out. I wanna see the floor. Take it all out. I wanna see the floor.
translation.zh: 都铲出去 要露出地面来

translation.en: Now grab that sawdust over there near the saddles.
translation.zh: 把马鞍旁边的锯木屑拿过来

translation.en: Just like that.
Use the pitchfork.
Make it nice and even.
Come on, young'un, you did good. Come on out, man.
translation.zh: 加油 小伙子 你很棒

translation.en: -[Cole exhales] -[Paris] First stall from my end.
translation.zh: 我的第一个栏位清理好了

translation.en: -[Cole sighs] -[Paris] You all right?
[exhales] Yeah.
Let me get a little smile.
Little cheese. Cheese? Little something?
translation.zh: 说茄子 茄子 笑一笑吧？

translation.en: -[sighs] Nah. -[Paris] You're too hard for me, huh?
It's all right. I'mma change that, though.
[Paris] C'mon, no front-dumpin'. Take it all the way up.
translation.zh: 去吧 不要倒在前面 倒在上面

translation.en: Walk that plank.
translation.zh: 把车子顺着木板推上去

translation.en: Get in there.
-[grunts] -[Paris] Whoa. Whoa. Hold it.
Take it up. Go ahead. All the way up.
translation.zh: 推上去 用力 推到顶

translation.en: -[Cole panting] -[Paris] All the way up. You can do it.
translation.zh: 一直往上 你可以的

translation.en: -[strains] -[Paris] There you go.
[Paris] All the way up. All the way up.
Now flip it.
[Paris] There you go.
Yeah, young'un! -Yeah. -[man 1] You got it! Good job! Well done!
translation.zh: -可以啊 小伙子-没问题 做得好！

translation.en: Yeah. There you go, young'un. Yeah, there you go.
[man 2] Stand up, junior!
translation.zh: -那里有苏打水-加油 小伙子！

translation.en: -You aight? -[Cole sighs] Yeah.
All right. -Come on. Let's go get some more shit. -[Cole exhales]
translation.zh: 好了 走吧 我们再去铲点屎

translation.en: -[Boo nickers] -[Paris] Let's do Boo's stall.
-[Boo snorts, nickers] -[Cole] So, you gonna take him out?
Hell no.
-[Cole] Why not? -That motherfucker crazy.
translation.zh: 为什么不呢？ 因为它很疯的

translation.en: -So… So, what am I supposed to do? -Shit, you sleep with him.
translation.zh: 那我该怎么办？ 你在它旁边睡了一晚呢 直接清理

translation.en: Clean around him.
translation.zh: 你在它旁边睡了一晚呢 直接清理

translation.en: -[Paris] Get in there. -[Boo grunts, exhales]
[Cole] Don't be wildin' out on me.
Okay? We boys now.
translation.zh: 好吧？我们现在是朋友了

translation.en: [Paris] Get up in there, man.
-[Paris] Aight. -Hey, back up.
[Paris] Yeah. Don't let him come out.
-Back up. -[Paris] He get out, it's over. He gone.
translation.zh: -后退-如果它出来 就再也抓不回来了

translation.en: Back up. [grunts]
-[Boo grunts] -[Paris] All right. Now get up in there.
Ain't nobody been in there with Boo for a minute.
-Clean all that shit outta there. -[Cole] Right here? Right here?
translation.zh: -把里面的粪清理出来-这里吗？

translation.en: -Corners, all that. Get it out. -[Cole] Shit.
translation.zh: -这里吗？-角落里的 都要清理出来

translation.en: So, how much does it cost to take care of a horse?
translation.zh: 所以 照顾一匹马要多少钱？

translation.en: Could take your whole check.
translation.zh: 可能会花费你全部的收入

translation.en: Sometimes I don't even eat just to feed Little.
translation.zh: 有时候 我自己不吃饭节省下来喂小小

translation.en: [Cole] Which one of them is Little?
[Paris] The quarter horse tied up outside.
-Why you name him Little? -[Boo nickering]
I named him after my little bro.
Got killed a couple years ago.
[sighs heavily] Sorry to hear that, man.
[Cole takes a deep breath] So…
So how you ride him, then?
I don't.
What you think they gonna do with Boo?
translation.zh: 你觉得他们会怎么处置啵啵？

translation.en: I guess that's up to you.
Come on, man. Get your ass back to work. Stop asking me all these damn questions.
translation.zh: 好了 赶紧干活 别再问了

translation.en: -[man 2] Yeah. -[man 3] Oh, okay.
[man 4] That's 'cause you think all cowboys was white.
translation.zh: 那是因为你们认为 牛仔都是白人

translation.en: That's some Hollywood John Wayne bullshit.
translation.zh: 那是好莱坞的约翰韦恩演的

translation.en: Fifty percent of all cowboys were Black, brown, bronze,
translation.zh: 一半牛仔的皮肤是黑色 棕色 铜色

translation.en: or some other color.
[laughs] You said 50? Where you getting them numbers from, nigga?
translation.zh: 有一半吗？这个数字从哪里来的？

translation.en: Look it up! Real rap! Even the Lone Ranger was Black.
translation.zh: 你去查一下！是真的！连独行侠都是黑人

translation.en: -Who's the Lone Ranger? -Get the fuck outta here.
-[Esha] Really? -Harp, you teachin' this boy?
translation.zh: -真的吗？-你教过这孩子什么吗？

translation.en: Man, you doin' a good job.
No, he's right. Look, Hollywood has whitewashed us.
translation.zh: 他说的对 好莱坞把我们抹去了

translation.en: They just deleted us right out of the history books.
translation.zh: 把我们从历史书里直接删除了

translation.en: They always trying to delete us from history books.
translation.zh: 他们总是想把我们从历史里删去

translation.en: "Cowhand" became "cowboy." Did you know that? That's what they called us.
translation.zh: “放牛人”变成了“牛仔” 知道吗？他们就是这样称呼我们

translation.en: "Hey, boy. Hold that cattle down while I brand it."
translation.zh: “嘿 小仔 扶着牛 我来给它烙号 ”

translation.en: "Hey, boy. Go break that horse."
You know why we was able to break them horses so good?
translation.zh: 知道我们为什么擅长驯马吗？

translation.en: -Why? Come on, why? -[Esha] Why? Tell us.
[man 5] Come on, Rome, tell us!
translation.zh: 快点 罗姆 告诉我们！

translation.en: -Tell them, Nessie. I gotta pee. -[group laughs]
translation.zh: 内西 你告诉他们 我要去尿尿

translation.en: People used to believe breaking a horse meant crushin' the will of the animal,
translation.zh: 以前 人们认为 驯马是将它驯服

translation.en: dominating 'em, making 'em believe that the only way it was gonna survive
translation.zh: 控制它 让马知道 要想活命

translation.en: was to submit, right?
Well, Black folks, we knew that a horse wasn't meant to be dominated.
translation.zh: 我们黑人明白 不能支配马匹

translation.en: A horse is meant to be free.
-[man 1] Yep. -[Esha] That's right.
Only way you can realize its true spirit, its nature,
translation.zh: 要想感知它 了解它的习性

translation.en: is through love.
-[Rome] Real rap. You feel that? -[Paris] Become one.
translation.zh: 是这样的 懂了吗？ 人马合一

translation.en: Where'd you guys come from if all the Black cowboys got deleted?
translation.zh: 如果黑人牛仔消失了你们从哪里来？

translation.en: [man 6] I've been at it since I was nine.
-[Nessie] Ooh! -Right down here.
Ridin' ponies and drivin' horse and wagons.
Oh, man. We here… We all over.
translation.zh: 天啊 当时到处都是黑人牛仔

translation.en: History… The history here is deep.
Everybody, like, used to get their food from wagons.
translation.zh: 在过去 每个人都从马车上买食物

translation.en: Horses and carriages, buggies and all that.
translation.zh: 马拉着车 还可以载客

translation.en: Uncle Charlie, like, what we talk about? Back in the day--
translation.zh: 查理叔叔 说到哪里了？过去…

translation.en: What happened with that was, as the years was goin' on,
translation.zh: 其实是因为 随着历史发展

translation.en: the city decide they don't need horses no more.
translation.zh: 市政府决定不再需要用马了

translation.en: -They was gettin' trucks. -[man 5] Mm-hmm.
So they said, "Well, we don't need the horses no more."
translation.zh: 所以他们说 “我们不再需要马了”

translation.en: -But all of us down here, we love horses. -[Harp] Yes, we do. Yes, we do.
And that's how all these stables popped up.
translation.zh: 所以这些马厩接连出现

translation.en: See, you got 31st Street, you got 32nd, you got Cobb Creek.
translation.zh: 有第31街 第32街 科布溪区

translation.en: [Harp] Yup.
-[Esha] Markoe Street. -White House.
[Rome] And the number one on that list, 9th and Tioga.
translation.zh: 最好的就是在九街和泰奥加街

translation.en: [Nessie] Here we go.
You just gonna forget about us Fletcher Street originals, huh?
translation.zh: 弗莱彻街马厩也是最先建立的忘了吗？

translation.en: I'm talkin' about real riders. Not no bitch-ass horse owners.
translation.zh: 我说的是牛仔 不是马主人

translation.en: Yeah, you right. You know what? I do own all your horses.
translation.zh: 对 但是你知道吗？你的马都是我的

translation.en: Same horses I been whupping your ass with.
Time passed and, one by one, they got shut down.
translation.zh: 慢慢的 一家接着一家 马厩被关闭

translation.en: -[man 1] Yep. -Why?
Real estate.
Developers coming in, they see the horses, they like, "Horses? Pfft. Fuck that."
translation.zh: 房地产开发商看到马匹他们说 “马？去死吧”

translation.en: I mean, a lot of these boys used to own their own stable.
translation.zh: 我们这里很多人都有自己的马厩

translation.en: They runnin' up on these boys, like, "Hey, this your land? Let me get that."
translation.zh: 开发商跟我们说“这是你的地吗？卖给我吧”

translation.en: Like, Fletcher Street, right here,
translation.zh: 弗莱彻街马厩 就像牛仔孤儿院

translation.en: we like some cowboy orphans, you know what I'm sayin'?
translation.zh: 弗莱彻街马厩 就像牛仔孤儿院 你懂吧？我们…

translation.en: We like the la-- We like the Wild West out here.
translation.zh: 你懂吧？我们… 我们就像《狂野西部》最后一家马厩

translation.en: The last remainin'.
translation.zh: 我们就像《狂野西部》最后一家马厩

translation.en: [Rome] Ah, shit. Here we go, y'all.
Why you gotta make all that noise, though, man?
translation.zh: 为什么要发出那种声音？

translation.en: -Turn off them damn lights. -[Paris] Come on, man.
-Here come Leroy with his bullshit. -[group groans]
-[woman] Here we go. -[Nessie] Here come the sheriff.
[Rome] Oh, here we go.
Is that marijuana I smell?
[Paris] That's the fire can burning. The fire can burning.
Evening, gentlemen.
-Nessie. -[Nessie] Leroy.
Esha.
This here is Harp's boy, back from Detroit.
translation.zh: 他是哈普的儿子 从底特律来的

translation.en: Harp's boy, huh?
Are they tellin' you about how your father was around here in--
translation.zh: 他们有没有告诉你 你爸在…

translation.en: [Harp] Aight, man. You good, L?
-You good? -[man 2 laughs]
Yeah, I'm good, but I tell you what ain't good.
translation.zh: 我挺好 我跟你说说什么不好

translation.en: -[Harp] What? -[Leroy] Them raggedy-ass stables.
-Aight? They broken. Roof's slanted. -[Rome] There he goes.
translation.zh: -对吧？破破烂烂 屋顶也歪了-他又要叨叨了

translation.en: Aight, the stalls is crowded as a motherfucker,
and the neighbors are complainin' about the smell again.
translation.zh: 邻居又投诉难闻的气味了

translation.en: [Rome] Smell? You smell something?
translation.zh: 怎么 你闻到什么了？

translation.en: What you gonna do about that dead horse?
translation.zh: 你要怎么处理那匹死马？

translation.en: -Dead horse? What? -[Nessie] Johnny got that horse.
translation.zh: 死马？ 强尼过来运走了 他运走了

translation.en: -He came and got it. -[Harp] Yeah.
translation.zh: 强尼过来运走了 他运走了

translation.en: I saw the city stopped by.
translation.zh: -是啊-我看到费城领导来视察过

translation.en: Yeah, well, they been stoppin' by for 15 years, man.
Y'all seen those new condos on Oxford. That's only five blocks from here.
translation.zh: 牛津区修了新的公寓离这里就五个街区

translation.en: [Rome] Pfft. Five blocks?
That's a long way for them skinny, hipster-ass latte motherfuckers to be walkin'.
-[group chuckles] -Developers are comin'.
-Believe it. -Well, let 'em come.
We'll see what the fuck happens.
See what-- Okay, that's where I'mma stop you.
See, what happens is you don't own any of this shit.
Y'all just rentin'.
So that brings me to my next question. What are we doin' about it?
translation.zh: 所以下一个问题 我们该怎么办？

translation.en: -[Paris] "We"? You speakin' French? -[Rome] What do you mean, "we," white man?
translation.zh: -“我们”？你说什么呢？-“我们”？谁跟你论“我们” 狗腿子？

translation.en: Man, look. We ain't doin' shit.
translation.zh: 哥们儿 我们什么都没做

translation.en: You traded in your saddle for your city brass.
translation.zh: 你放弃马匹 选择当警察

translation.en: History gonna repeat itself, and you all out here,
translation.zh: 历史总是会重演的 你们这些人

translation.en: just another night of drinkin' and smokin'
translation.zh: 每天晚上喝酒 抽烟 撒谎

translation.en: and lyin' to each other, when you need to be--
translation.zh: 每天晚上喝酒 抽烟 撒谎 你们应该…

translation.en: Man, L, you know what?
Do me a favor. Drink that, or go write some parking tickets.
translation.zh: 拜托 要么喝酒 要么就去开罚单吧

translation.en: [man 5] All right.
[Harp] Just-- My van over there, so just leave that alone,
translation.zh: -对 干杯-我的车在那边 你去开罚单吧

translation.en: but write some parking tickets, man.
Yo, yo, yo. You know what I'mma do?
You're right. I'mma drink this, but then I'mma go give parking tickets.
translation.zh: 你说得对 我先喝酒 然后再开罚单

translation.en: First person getting a ticket is the nigga in the wheelchair.
-Damn. -[group chattering]
Hey, Georgie, shut these fools up.
translation.zh: 嘿 乔吉 让他们闭嘴

translation.en: -Talking that shit. -[man 1] Aw, man.
Come on. Hey, Cole, you gotta hear this. This guy a killer, right here.
translation.zh: 科尔 来听听 他最牛了

translation.en: Hear this. This guy good. From the '40s, here.
translation.zh: 他真的很棒 他是40年代的

translation.en: This trap music from the '40s. Hey. Play that. I know you got it on you.
translation.zh: 这是40年代的陷阱音乐来一段 我知道你带着口琴的

translation.en: -Aight, aight. Aight. -[Rome] There it is.
-[Harp] Don't act like you don't wanna. -[Esha] Yes.
-[upbeat tune playing on harmonica] -[Harp] Okay, then.
[Georgie] ♪ Here on my own ♪
[Georgie] ♪ Here all alone ♪
♪ I'm here with nobody ♪
♪ I'm out here, and I'm all on my own ♪
translation.zh: 只有我一人 孤身一人

translation.en: ♪ With the wind at my side ♪
♪ My horse, I'm astride ♪
♪ Give me a sign ♪
[rapping] ♪ We ain't scared of no po-po ♪
♪ Comin' around, tryna take our stables ♪
translation.zh: 警察想夺走我们的马厩

translation.en: ♪ I don't care about y'all What y'all wanna say ♪
translation.zh: 我不管 我不顾 随便你如何

translation.en: ♪ We hard, we Fletcher Street, all day ♪
translation.zh: 弗莱彻街 我们永远不服

translation.en: ♪ What y'all wanna do? Take our shit? ♪
Chuck. Chuck, you like cheese?
translation.zh: 查克 查克 你喜欢奶酪吗？

translation.en: -Want some cheese? Wanna try some cheese? -[Chuck nickers]
-All right. Take it easy. Whoa. -[Chuck whinnies]
-Look at that. -[Chuck sighs]
-Yo. -Hey. What's good with you?
This my boy, Cole, from Detroit. Y'all chillin'?
translation.zh: 这是我朋友科尔 从底特律来的玩得开心吗？

translation.en: Hey, yo. I ain't seen you in a minute. You still spittin', bro?
translation.zh: 好久不见 还在说唱吗？

translation.en: -[man 1] My man. What's good? -What's up with you?
-[Smush] My boy, Cole. From Detroit. -[man 2] What's up?
translation.zh: -我朋友科尔 来自底特律-你好吗？

translation.en: [Smush] Y'all take care of him. Ya hear me?
translation.zh: 你们都照顾好他 听到了吗？

translation.en: Hi, ladies. What's up?
translation.zh: 嘿 女孩们 还好吗？

translation.en: -[woman] Hey. Yeah. -Yeah. Get it moving.
That's my boy, Cole, from Detroit.
translation.zh: 我朋友科尔 从底特律来

translation.en: Cole, say hi.
-[Cole] Cole. -[woman] Hey, Cole. What's up?
[Smush] We chillin'. You guys good tonight?
translation.zh: 玩得开心 今晚还好吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -[man 3] Hey, yo, Smush.
[woman] Yeah. Yeah.
Let me holla at you, man.
Let me pull your coattails real quick.
translation.zh: 你过来 简单聊两句

translation.en: Yeah.
What's up, J?
Little bit of me. Whole lot of everybody else, man.
translation.zh: 我很好 别人可能不好

translation.en: Yeah, man. You know, that's how it go.
translation.zh: 是的 你知道的 就是这样

translation.en: Listen, one of my young bouls told me
translation.zh: 听着 有一个兄弟告诉我

translation.en: somebody tryna come up on me on one of my corners.
translation.zh: 有个人想要在我地盘上抢生意

translation.en: Heard any whispers?
Nah, man. I… I ain't hear shit.
Nah?
Okay. Make sure you bend an ear for me, aight?
translation.zh: 好 帮我留心这件事 好吗？

translation.en: No doubt. You know I got you.
translation.zh: 当然 你知道 有我在

translation.en: So, who this?
Oh, yeah, shit. This is my… my boy, Cole, from Detroit.
translation.zh: 哦 这是我哥们儿科尔 从底特律来

translation.en: Tryna show him how Philly do. Know what I'm saying, boul?
translation.zh: 带他转转费城 你知道吧？

translation.en: Let me holla at this nigga real quick.
[sighs] Okay, playa.
They some nice sneaks.
Some Js, right?
Yeah.
Them jawns hot, young boul.
How much they run you?
I don't know. My pops got 'em for me.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我爸给我买的

translation.en: Your pops. Your pops a good dude.
translation.zh: 你爸 你爸是个好人

translation.en: Them jawns is hot.
They expensive too.
Yah mean, Pops?
Fasho.
Go on, man.
-Enjoy yourself, young boul. -["Lightwork" playing on stereo]
Aight, man. Cool.
Appreciate you. You good? You good?
[Paris] Grab that brush right there.
I want you to go from the top, goin' all the way down
translation.zh: 从上面开始 一直刷到它的屁股

translation.en: to the barrel of his ass.
-[horse nickering] -Come on.
Brush him all the way down to his foot. Yup.
There you go. You gettin' in there.
Paris, can I ask you a question?
translation.zh: 派瑞斯 我能问一个问题吗？

translation.en: [Paris] Yeah.
-How'd you end up in the chair? -[Paris takes a deep breath]
Couple years ago,
me and my brother went out riding…
translation.zh: 我和我兄弟开车去兜风

translation.en: …and got into an altercation.
Ended up in the hospital.
I woke up.
He didn't.
Bullet shattered my spine.
Now I spend the rest of my life in this chair.
translation.zh: 一辈子就困在轮椅上了

translation.en: Fightin' over nothing.
Fightin' over a corner.
The city, they built a Starbucks right on the corner.
translation.zh: 最后那个街角开了一家星巴克

translation.en: Shit we was fighting over.
All over nothin'.
[quietly] Fuck.
[Cole] No, I'm telling you, he knows.
translation.zh: 不 我告诉你 他知道的

translation.en: Nigga, he was asking about my shoes.
-We just gotta-- -That nigga onto us.
We gotta switch up the drop spots. Aight? It's simple.
translation.zh: 我们要换地方了 对吧？很简单

translation.en: Man, them niggas' palms is itchy anyway.
translation.zh: 哥们儿 他们手心很痒痒的

translation.en: Man, let me rap with you.
We cool. Okay? We cool.
translation.zh: 我们没事的 好吗？我们没事

translation.en: Aight, I'mma put it like this.
A lion… who's, like, feedin' on rhinos and shit,
translation.zh: 一头狮子… 如果 它捕猎犀牛为食

translation.en: don't got time to be chasing no rabbits.
-You know what I'm sayin'? -You good, man?
I just made that shit up. Nigga, that's clever, bro.
translation.zh: 我现编的 太聪明了

translation.en: [laughs] You should write that shit down. It's real.
translation.zh: 你该记下来 是真的

translation.en: We're gonna own something together, man.
Me and you.
-[Cole sniffles] -You believe that?
Yeah.
Nah, man. I said, "Do you believe that?"
Yeah, I believe you.
We gonna be okay.
Aight? As long as you with me, we gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 好吗？只要你和我在一起 就没事

translation.en: Aight.

translation.en: And there are people, all the time, who say to me,

translation.en: "What do you mean, you ride horses? Where? There are no horses in Philadelphia."
translation.zh: “你骑马吗？在哪里？费城没有马”

translation.en: It's like, "What are you talking about? There are horses all over Philadelphia."

translation.en: And, like, yes, in North Philly, we ride horses.

translation.en: Like, we have horses. We take care of the horses.
